name: CMH SERVICES
sampleDescriptions: HUD Code enforcement, regulation of manufactured housing.

H.R. 1699--To amend the Truth in Lending Act to modify the definitions of a mortgage originator and a high-cost mortgage, to amend the Secure and Fair Enforcement for Mortgage Licensing Act of 2008 to modify the definition of a loan originator, and for other purposes.
